course_title: Interprofessional Education and Collaborative Practice II
course_description: This course is intended to fully integrate IPECP into the DPT program by connecting IPECP concepts and learning activities from current and expanded didactic, simulation, and clinical experiences. This course will address Commission on Accreditation in Physical Therapy Education (CAPTE) IPECP accreditation requirements.
